title: [Lumnea Meadow]
description: A long grey granite slab, speckled with bits of shimmering blue sapphire, rests atop a stack of smaller stones.  Numerous small candles burn atop the slab.  Scattered amongst the candles, small nosegays and flowers adorn the austere makeshift altar.  A small parchment lies in the center of the stone's flat surface.
